item.title: A genetic tweak could prevent mosquitoes from transmitting malaria
item.description: A new study reports on a novel way to short-circuit the parasite that spreads the disease so people wouldn't get infected with a mosquito's bite.

item.title: Older adults should have a go bag for medical emergencies, health experts say

item.title: Eating disorder recovery in a world of diet culture

item.title: People who have lost their voices are using AI technology to regain them
item.description: AI-generated speech can be heard in customer service and media. Now some patients who lost the ability to talk due to cancer or other disease are usin...

item.title: Cancer stole her voice. AI, curse words and children's books saved it
item.description: Sonya Sotinsky recorded herself talking and reading books to preserve a critical element of her personality: her voice. After surgery for oral cancer,...
